name: A new perspective for paint
description:
Submerged painting photography. Investigation into the behavior of matter starting from its manipulation as a premise for a photographic series. Critique of pointless digital manipulation. The idea of ​​imaginary is similar to that of an aquarium (in Portuguese the suffix ário indicates a delimited space, box, room, so that aquarium is a water box).

It results from a series composed at the beginning of the covid19 pandemic, in reflections on the principle of transformation in the universe.

2499x2499

Composed by visual artist Vinícius Lisboa - @vinil.lisboa @graphicusliber
